name: Soul Tether
description: Ravage nearby enemies' souls with a night rune, dealing 3600 Magic Damage, healing for half the damage, and stunning them for 4 seconds.   Ravaged enemies are tethered to you for 8 seconds, and while they remain within 10 meters, you siphon 627 Health from them every second.  An ally can target a ravaged enemy and activate the Soul Tether synergy, dealing 3122 Magic Damage to them and healing for the damage caused.
effectLines: You heal for half the initial damage caused, and enemies hit are tethered to you.  You deal constant damage and heal while tethered.

Ravaged enemies are tethered to you for 8 seconds, and while they remain within 10 meters, you siphon $2 Health from them every second.  An ally can target a ravaged enemy and activate the Soul Tether synergy, dealing $3 Magic Damage to them and healing for the damage caused.
